mapper.insert: insert into movies (id, publish_date, open_date, age_limit, dubbed) values (#{id}, #{publishDate}, #{openDate}, #{ageLimit}, #{dubbed})
insert into movie_genre (id, movie_id, genre_id) values (seq_movie_genre.nextval, #{movieId}, #{genreId})
insert into genre_translation (id, type, lang_iso, genre_id) values (seq_genre_translation.nextval, #{type}, 'ko', #{genre.id})
insert into movie_images (id, image_uri, movie_id) values (seq_movie_images.nextval, #{imageUri}, #{movie.id})
insert into movie_translation (id, name, publish_country, description, movie_id, lang_iso) values (seq_movie_translation.nextval, #{name}, #{publishCountry}, #{description}, #{movie.id}, 'ko')
mapper.select:
select A.name name, B.id "movie.id", B.age_limit "movie.ageLimit", B.publish_date "movie.publishDate", B.open_date "movie.openDate", B.close_date "movie.closeDate", B.dubbed "movie.dubbed"
from movie_translation A, movies B where A.movie_id = B.id
and A.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and B.publish_date like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and B.open_date like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and B.close_date like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select id id, name name, description description, publish_country publishCountry, lang_iso langiso, lang_default langdefault, movie_id "movie.id" from movie_translation where movie_id = #{value}
select id id, image_uri imageUri, movie_id "movie.id" from MOVIE_IMAGES where movie_id = #{value}

select A.id id, A.type type, A.lang_iso langiso, A.lang_default langdefault, A.genre_id "genre.id", B.movie_id "movie.id" from genre_translation A , movie_genre B where A.genre_id = B.genre_id and B.movie_id = #{value}
select id id, publish_date publishDate, open_date openDate, age_limit ageLimit, close_date closeDate, dubbed dubbed from movies where id = #{value}
mapper.update: update movies set close_date = SYSDATE where id = #{value}
mapper.select: select A.name name, B.id id, B.open_date openDate, B.close_date closeDate, B.dubbed dubbed from movie_translation A, movies B where A.MOVIE_ID = B.ID and B.OPEN_DATE <= #{value} and (#{value} < B.CLOSE_DATE or B.CLOSE_DATE is null)
mapper.insert: insert into movie_timetable (id, started_at, ended_at, screen_movie_id) values (seq_movie_timetable.nextval, #{startedAt}, #{endedAt}, #{screenMovie.id})
insert into screen_movies (id, screen_id, movie_id) values (#{id}, #{screen.id}, #{movie.id})
